description: Vegetarian sausages stay juicy when cooked gently in the slow cooker in this tasty casserole.
keywords: Casserole,Halal,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Kale,Sweet potato,Egg free,Tomato,Slow cooker,Sesame free
name: Slow Cooker Vegetarian Sausage Casserole Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium carrots, peeled and chopped into chunks
1 large sweet potato, peeled and chopped into chunks
1 cup vegetable stock, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions for 5 minutes. Remove with a slotted spoon and add to the slow cooker. Cook the carrots and sausages with the garlic for 2-3 minutes and add to the slow cooker.

Tip in the sweet potato, chopped tomatoes, rosemary, oregano and stock and cook on high for 3.5 hours. Stir in the kale and parmesan and cook for 20 minutes, until wilted. Remove the rosemary and serve.
